thread.title: Alex Rodriguez destroys TV screen during pregame show
thread.title_full: Alex Rodriguez destroys TV screen during pregame show

title: Alex Rodriguez destroys TV screen during pregame show
text:
Alex Rodriguez destroys TV screen during pregame show A-Rod appears on pregame show UPDATED 12:14 PM CDT Oct 19, 2015 Photos Tom Pennington/Getty Images 
New York Yankees baseball great Alex Rodriguez might actually make a good NFL quarterback -- he throws high, where only his receiver could possibly make the catch. More 
His receiver during a Fox NFL pregame show Sunday was host Jay Glazer, and suffice it to say, Glazer couldn't make the play. 
A-Rod's throw sailed past Glazer's outstretched arm and into a TV screen. It appeared the ill-fated toss destroyed the screen. 
That's why you don't throw the ball inside the house, boys.
